english.segment1: And I stand in awe of You, Jesus. Yes, I stand in awe of You
english.segment2: You are God in Heaven. And here am I on earth. So I'll let my words be few. Jesus, I am so in love with You
english.segment3: Oh, And I'll stand in awe of You. Yes, I'll stand in awe of You. And I'll let my words be few. 'Cause, Jesus, I am so in love with you
english.segment4: The simplest of all love songs. I want to bring to you. So I'll let my words be few. Oh, 'cause, Jesus, I am so in love with you
